articles.title: Ray Xiaoyu He
articles.contents:
About Me

          About

              Ray Xiaoyu He
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            Welcome to my page! My name is Ray, and I am a full-time
            student at the University of Michigan Ann Arbor, majoring in
            Psychology. Meanwhile, I minor in Statistics and Social
            Class and Inequality Studies.
            By browsing the self-built website, you will find more
            information about my experience, career goals and passions,
            and thoughts about the project I am working on. You will
            also view assignments and projects I completed during my
            studies at UCONN and UMich. I appreciate your interest, and
            please reach out to me if you have any questions. I hope you
            enjoy reading over the information on my website as much as
            I created it for you.
            
            
            Education
            University of Michigan Ann Arbor | Ann
            Arbor, MI B.S. in Psychology | September 2020 - May 2023
            Minor in Statistics Minor in Social Class and
            Inequality Studies
            University of Connecticut | Stamford, CT
            Bachelor of Arts and Science in Psychology | September
            2018 - May 2020
            
            
            Experience
            Bosera Funds | Human Resources Department Intern |
            January 2021 - April 2021 Hey China Club, UCONN |
            Activities Coordinator | October 2018 - May 2020
